channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI

item.title: Report X-2023071012
item.description:
Report X-2023071012

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • City: JOHNSTON
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found wet and leaking package put in hazmat leak bin DescribePack: package wet on top upon inspection 2 out of six cans were found to be leaking through the cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was put in a leak bin
